audioText: Pendant la réunion parent-professeur, l'enseignante a expliqué que leur fils avait des difficultés en mathématiques mais excellait en français et en art.
question: What did the teacher tell the parents during the parent-teacher meeting?
options: Their son had difficulties in math but excelled in French and art
Their son was the best student in all subjects this year
Their son needed to spend more time studying at home
Their son was having behavioral problems during class
explanation: During the parent-teacher meeting ('réunion parent-professeur'), the teacher explained that 'leur fils avait des difficultés en mathématiques mais excellait en français et en art' - their son had difficulties in mathematics but excelled in French and art. This shows typical school-parent communication about academic performance.
